text: [ This story contains spoilers from the March 14 episode of The X - Files. ] When first - time The X - Files scribe Karen Nielsen wrote Wednesday ’ s episode, “ Nothing Lasts Forever, ” she set out to tell a character - based piece. “ I wanted to have some character moments with Mulder and Scully — that was super important to me, ” says Nielsen. “ I thought it would be interesting to have Scully reflecting on her religion. My sister is very Catholic, and I ’ m not. So I liked the dynamic of Scully being very Catholic and Mulder not ; I related to that. ” What Nielsen didn ’ t know at the time was that her episode would shift back one to become the penultimate episode of the season and potentially the series as a whole.
